verses.verse: Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about <S%H9201>when<s%> it was <S%H8085>reported<s%> to <S%H5571>Sanballat,<s%> <S%H2900>Tobiah,<s%> to <S%H1654>Geshem<s%> the <S%H6163>Arab,<s%> and to the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of our <S%H340>enemies<s%> that I had <S%H1129>rebuilt<s%> the <S%H2346>wall,<s%> and [that] <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H6556>breach<s%> <S%H3498>remained<s%> in it, <S%H1571>although<s%> at that <S%H6256>time<s%> I had not <S%H5975>set<s%> up the <S%H1817>doors<s%> in the <S%H8179>gates,<s%>

So I <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> "I am <S%H6213>doing<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> and I <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down.<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> should the <S%H4399>work<s%> <S%H7673>stop<s%> <S%H9201>while<s%> I <S%H7503>leave<s%> it and <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to you?"
And they <S%H7971>sent<s%> [messages] to me <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>manner,<s%> and I <S%H7725>answered<s%> them in the <S%H2088>same<s%> <S%H1697>way.<s%>

Then <S%H5571>Sanballat<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> his <S%H5288>servant<s%> to me in the <S%H2088>same<s%> <S%H1697>manner<s%> a <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H6471>time<s%> with an <S%H6605>open<s%> <S%H107>letter<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

In it was <S%H3789>written,<s%> "It is <S%H8085>reported<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and <S%H1654>Gashmu<s%> <S%H559>says,<s%> that you and the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> are <S%H2803>planning<s%> to <S%H4775>rebel;<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> you are <S%H1129>rebuilding<s%> the <S%H2346>wall.<s%> And you are to be their <S%H4428>king,<s%> according to <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>reports.<s%>

"And you have <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H5975>appointed<s%> <S%H5030>prophets<s%> to <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> you, 'A <S%H4428>king<s%> is in <S%H3063>Judah!<s%>' And <S%H6258>now<s%> it will be <S%H8085>reported<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> according to <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>reports.<s%> So <S%H1980>come<s%> <S%H6258>now,<s%> let us <S%H3289>take<s%> <S%H3289>counsel<s%> <S%H9191>together.<s%>"

Then I <S%H7971>sent<s%> [a message] to him <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H428>"Such<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> as you are <S%H559>saying<s%> have not <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H1961>done,<s%> but you are <S%H908>inventing<s%> them in your own <S%H3820>mind.<s%>"

For <S%H3605>all<s%> of them were [trying] to <S%H3372>frighten<s%> us, <S%H559>thinking,<s%> "They will <S%H3027>become<s%> <S%H7503><s%> <S%H7503>discouraged<s%> <S%H3027><s%> with the <S%H4399>work<s%> and it will not be <S%H6213>done.<s%>" But <S%H6258>now,<s%> [O God,] <S%H2388>strengthen<s%> my <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

And when I <S%H935>entered<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1806>Delaiah,<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4105>Mehetabel,<s%> <S%H1931>who<s%> was <S%H6113>confined<s%> at home, he <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let us <S%H3259>meet<s%> <S%H3259>together<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> the <S%H1964>temple,<s%> and let us <S%H5462>close<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of the <S%H1964>temple,<s%> for they are <S%H935>coming<s%> to <S%H2026>kill<s%> you, and they are <S%H935>coming<s%> to <S%H2026>kill<s%> you at <S%H3915>night.<s%>"

But I <S%H559>said,<s%> "Should a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> me <S%H1272>flee<s%>? And could one <S%H3644>such<s%> as I <S%H935>go<s%> into the <S%H1964>temple<s%> to <S%H2421>save<s%> his <S%H2421>life<s%>? I will not <S%H935>go<s%> in."

Then I <S%H5234>perceived<s%> that <S%H2009>surely<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had not <S%H7971>sent<s%> him, but he <S%H1696>uttered<s%> [his] <S%H5016>prophecy<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me because <S%H2900>Tobiah<s%> and <S%H5571>Sanballat<s%> had <S%H7936>hired<s%> him.

He was <S%H7936>hired<s%> for <S%H4616>this<s%> <S%H4616>reason,<s%> that I might <S%H3372>become<s%> <S%H3372>frightened<s%> and <S%H6213>act<s%> <S%H3651>accordingly<s%> and <S%H2398>sin,<s%> so that they might <S%H1961>have<s%> an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H8034>report<s%> in <S%H4616>order<s%> that they could <S%H2778>reproach<s%> me.

<S%H2142>Remember,<s%> O my <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H2900>Tobiah<s%> and <S%H5571>Sanballat<s%> according to <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4639>works<s%> of theirs, and <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H5129>Noadiah<s%> the <S%H5031>prophetess<s%> and the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were [trying] to <S%H3372>frighten<s%> me.
So the <S%H2346>wall<s%> was <S%H9608>completed<s%> on the twenty-fifth of [the month] <S%H435>Elul,<s%> in fifty-two <S%H3117>days.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about <S%H9201>when<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> our <S%H340>enemies<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> [of it,] and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H5439>surrounding<s%> us <S%H7200>saw<s%> [it,] they <S%H5307>lost<s%> their <S%H5869>confidence;<s%> for they <S%H3045>recognized<s%> that <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> had been <S%H6213>accomplished<s%> with the <S%H4480>help<s%> <S%H854><s%> of our <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H1571>Also<s%> in <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H107>letters<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> from the <S%H2715>nobles<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> to <S%H2900>Tobiah,<s%> and Tobiah's [letters] <S%H935>came<s%> to them.

For <S%H7227>many<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah<s%> were <S%H1167>bound<s%> by <S%H7621>oath<s%> to him <S%H3588>because<s%> he was the <S%H1121>son-in-law<s%> of <S%H7935>Shecaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H733>Arah,<s%> and his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3076>Jehohanan<s%> had <S%H3947>married<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H4918>Meshullam<s%> the son of <S%H1296>Berechiah.<s%>

<S%H1571>Moreover,<s%> they were <S%H559>speaking<s%> about his <S%H9186>good<s%> <S%H9186>deeds<s%> in my <S%H6440>presence<s%> and <S%H3318>reported<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%> to him. Then <S%H2900>Tobiah<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H107>letters<s%> to <S%H3372>frighten<s%> me.
